title: LACRuMAE || In memoriam piorum Manium || REVERENDI,|| ... DN. IOANNIS GEORGII VOLCMARI,|| S. Th. Doct. & Profess. publici &c. 15. Martij currentis anni, ex || hâc terrenâ ad coelestem Academiam ... || evocati,|| piae observantiae ac gratae pietatis ergò || In illustri Academia VVitebergensi || publicè praestitae:|| ET || Venerando ... || DN. MARTINO VOLCMARO || Ecclesiarum Lobenstainensium Superintendenti dignis-||simo, parenti moestissimo:|| Nec non || Amplißimo ... || DN. THOBIAE OBERLENDERO,|| Illustrium Comitum Ruttenorum à secretis, etc. defuncti socero || ... dedicatae ac transmissae:|| A || M. IOHANNE LIMBERTO || Hüxariense Saxone.||
creator: Limbertus, Johannes  Runge, David  Volckmar, Johann Georg
subject: Historische Drucke
